PaladinMod:PaladinUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
PaladinMod:PaladinUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

PaladinMod:PaladinRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
PaladinMod:PaladinRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
PaladinMod:PaladinRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

PaladinMod:PaladinRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
PaladinMod:PaladinRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

PaladinMod:PaladinAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
PaladinMod:PaladinAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !PaladinMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

PaladinMod:PaladinSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
PaladinMod:PaladinSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !PaladinMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

PaladinMod:RighteousDuty.NAME: Righteous Duty
PaladinMod:RighteousDuty.DESCRIPTION: Remove your seal. Channel a Seal of Righteousness. Exhaust.
PaladinMod:RighteousDuty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Seal of Righteousness. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:FaithInTheLight.NAME: Faith In The Light
PaladinMod:FaithInTheLight.DESCRIPTION: Remove your seal. Channel a Seal of Light. Exhaust.
PaladinMod:FaithInTheLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Seal of Light. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:JusticeForAll.NAME: Justice For All
PaladinMod:JusticeForAll.DESCRIPTION: Remove your seal. Channel a Seal of Justice. Exhaust.
PaladinMod:JusticeForAll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Seal of Justice. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:WakeOfAshes.NAME: Wake of Ashes
PaladinMod:WakeOfAshes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain 5 Devotion.

PaladinMod:HolySmite.NAME: Holy Smite
PaladinMod:HolySmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! weak. NL Gain !M! Devotion.

PaladinMod:TemplarsVerdict.NAME: Templar's Verdict
PaladinMod:TemplarsVerdict.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have !M! or more Devotion, NL deal that much plus 15 instead.

PaladinMod:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
PaladinMod:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity until end of turn

PaladinMod:RighteousAnger.NAME: Righteous Anger
PaladinMod:RighteousAnger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage per devotion (Deals !D! Damage). NL Put a copy of this card into your discard pile.

PaladinMod:Judgement.NAME: Judgement
PaladinMod:Judgement.DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 Damage. NL Evoke your seal. NL Exhaust.
PaladinMod:Judgement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 Damage. NL Evoke your seal and rechannel it. NL Exhaust.

PaladinMod:LayOnHands.NAME: Lay On Hands
PaladinMod:LayOnHands.DESCRIPTION: Draw until your hand is full. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. NL Heal 10. NL Exhaust.

PaladinMod:SentinelStance.NAME: Sentinel Stance
PaladinMod:SentinelStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Valiance - Gain !M! plated armor.

PaladinMod:BlindingLight.NAME: Blinding Light
PaladinMod:BlindingLight.DESCRIPTION: All Enemies gain !M! weak. NL Gain !M! devotion. NL Draw a card.

PaladinMod:BlessingOfKings.NAME: Blessing of Kings
PaladinMod:BlessingOfKings.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

PaladinMod:FlashOfLight.NAME: Flash of Light
PaladinMod:FlashOfLight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Life. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Exhaust.

PaladinMod:CrusadersJudgement.NAME: Crusader's Judgement
PaladinMod:CrusadersJudgement.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand( !D! )

PaladinMod:DivineStorm.NAME: Divine Storm
PaladinMod:DivineStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Spend all Devotion and add a free copy of this card for each Devotion spent. (They will exhaust when played)

PaladinMod:ContemplativeMedicine.NAME: Contemplative Medicine
PaladinMod:ContemplativeMedicine.DESCRIPTION: Spend all Devotion.  Gain focus equal to Devotion spent.  Exhaust.
